bio:
Geimund is a Nord man and the stable-master of Solitude, the provincial capital of Skyrim.
He is married to Fridrika and has a son named Horm. He has been the stable-master for 8 years now. Before settling down outside Solitude with Fridrika, Geimund was a mercenary. He retired from mercenary work after a bad experience at Ravenscar Hollow.
name: Geimund
